Text: Why does nobody upload AVIs anymore?
They don't upload AVIs because they're watching on their monitors...

Please, people, seed
I'm downloading slow,
lessen your greed,
even just for this show,
and think in your mind,
what a good thing it is
to spread what you find
without consequence
mp4 is more economical. Comparable quality, smaller file size... Everyone wins!
Im positive if you go through the work of ripping it, encoding it, uploading it, and sharing it..... you can have it in any format you want :)
@lonsman It's funny, I download AVIs cause my TV doesn't support MP4s.
It's a pain in the ass when you watch in avi because of the TV/DVD...

This is fake. Inside the rar is a password protected file and instructions to go to a site full of ads to get the password. Went to the site, pulled the password out of the JavaScript (UA-11855010-4 if anyone cares), and the rar file has a CRC error anyway.

Save yourself the time, do not download.
Arg -- not a fake. Sorry. This has just an mp4. Ignore my previous comment.
Damocles, look at the uploader. eztv doesn't produce fakes :-)
Thank you eztv.  Thank you for the many torrents you have made that I have downloaded.

why do I constantly get "error: permission denied" in my torrent client?
I'm a registered pirate bay user. I seed.
